Lines.Description: Print 'Runtime Error: Bad teleporter' on quit
Yield on  timer to  next line
If 'camera_x' LessThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00001128
If 'camera_x' GreaterThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00001208
If 'camera_y' LessThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00001288
If 'camera_y' GreaterThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00001368
Print 'AGA is required for this Scorpion Engine Game' on quit
Print 'Cannot change yres while level loaded' on quit
Yield on  timer to  next line
